validatePdef

public static void validatePdef(java.io.Reader aReader,
                                IAeResourceValidationErrorHandler aHandler)
This static method can be called whenever a PDEF Document needs to be validated. The caller should provide their own implementation of a resource validation error handler.

doAdditionalPdefValidation

private static void doAdditionalPdefValidation(org.w3c.dom.Document aDocument,
                                               IAeResourceValidationErrorHandler aHandler)
Does some additional PDEF validation checks. This checks for problems that can not be caught by the schema.
